command.source: SELECT PCS_SYS_ID_NB, RBAT_SPLT_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_DT, CLNT_AFIL_CD, RBAT_CTRC_FRMA_CD, CLNT_MIN_AMT, CLNT_MAX_AMT, CLNT_MAX_CD, CLNT_MIN_CD, RBAT_PMPM_CD, PCS_RBAT_1_AMT, PCS_RBAT_2_AMT, PCS_SPLT_PCT, CLNT_RBAT_1_AMT, CLNT_RBAT_2_AMT, CLNT_SPLT_PCT, OTHR_SPLT_1_PCT, OTHR_SPLT_2_PCT, RBAT_ENRL_DPNT_CD, RECV_DT, TERM_DT, EFF_DT, LAST_CHG_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_TS, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD, GUAR_BSIS_CD, GUAR_AMT, GUAR_IND FROM ${dmt_schema}.kscc013_rebate_spl order by 1, 2
command.target: INSERT INTO ${pmt_schema}.kscc013_rebate_spl (PCS_SYS_ID_NB, RBAT_SPLT_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_DT, CLNT_AFIL_CD, RBAT_CTRC_FRMA_CD, CLNT_MIN_AMT, CLNT_MAX_AMT, CLNT_MAX_CD, CLNT_MIN_CD, RBAT_PMPM_CD, PCS_RBAT_1_AMT, PCS_RBAT_2_AMT, PCS_SPLT_PCT, CLNT_RBAT_1_AMT, CLNT_RBAT_2_AMT, CLNT_SPLT_PCT, OTHR_SPLT_1_PCT, OTHR_SPLT_2_PCT, RBAT_ENRL_DPNT_CD, RECV_DT, TERM_DT, EFF_DT, LAST_CHG_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_TS, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD, GUAR_BSIS_CD, GUAR_AMT, GUAR_IND ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

catch.command:
[ERROR] MF REFRESH kscc013

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}


#if (${script.getLastStatement()})

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}

#end

Stack Trace

${stackTrace}
